title: When Overwatch memes invade LoL | I Need Healing - Corki Mid [7.9]

embed.description: Want to know why I need the heals? Because I'm hurting so much from Raz being a smart arse and his puns.

replies.body:
1st and foremost... EVERY time Hecarim ganked you, you were holding onto TWO wards. Even placing down one of them could have saved your life.

Other than that, it was pretty funny. The editing was pretty good considering you're using iMovie.

The OPM meme at the beginning didn't have to be there for *sooooooooo* long. A second or two would have been enough. Also, your audio... invest in a better sounding mic... please. Even a $15 one from MightyApe would be better.
Yeah... my logitech headset is kinda weird now. But thanks for the input! I'll take it into consideration!
